title: How does NXG vet iOS engineers?
body: From evaluating their logical reason capabilities, communication proficiency, and ability to write well-documented and clean codes - we leave no stone unturned to vet iOS engineers.

title: How much does it cost to hire an iOS developer through NXG ?
body: We charge a fee for managing and facilitating the association between the client and the iOS developer i.e. approximately $25/hour subject to your business needs.

title: Will the hired developer work in my business hours?
body: Yes, the hired iOS developer will work in your business hours. However, a 5% extra charge exists for the Australia and US region (4 hours overlap with IST timezone) and a 10% additional charge for the Australia and US region (8 hours overlap with IST timezone).

title: Do you provide a trial period for hiring an iOS programmer?
body: Yes, we offer a 40 hours no-risk trial, wherein you can test the resource before actually deciding to hire them.

title: What are the key skills that an iOS developer should have?
body: The key skills an iOS developer must possess includes proficiency in Swift 3.0 programming language, Apple's Xcode IDE, Spatial Reasoning, UI and UX design experience and Human Interface Guidelines.
